translate.title: Kumasulira Kwa Zizindikiro
translate.description: Kumasulira Kosavuta kwa Chinenero Chamanja ndi Ma Models a Nthawi Yeniyeni.

hero.title: Masulirani pakati pa 40+ zilankhulo zosayinidwa ndi zoyankhulidwa munthawi yeniyeni.
hero.img: Chitsanzo cha kumasulira kwamoyo pakati pa Chinenero Chamanja cha ku America ndi Chingerezi

direction.spoken-to-signed: Masulirani kuchokera ku zilankhulo zoyankhulidwa ndi manja
direction.signed-to-spoken: Kapena kuchokera ku zilankhulo zoyankhulidwa ndi manja mpaka zolankhulidwa

real-time.title: Kumasulira Nthawi Yeniyeni
real-time.subtitle: Masulirani pakati pa 40+ zilankhulo zosayinidwa ndi zoyankhulidwa munthawi yeniyeni
real-time.description: Pulogalamu yathu imakupatsani mwayi wolankhulana mwachibadwa komanso mosavuta ndi aliyense, kulikonse, nthawi iliyonse, m'chinenero chanu chamanja.

multilingual.title: Thandizo la Zinenero Zambiri
multilingual.subtitle: Masulirani pakati pa zilankhulo zamanja zosiyanasiyana ndi zilankhulo zolankhulidwa
multilingual.description: Pulogalamu yathu imathandizira zilankhulo zamanja ndi zilankhulo zingapo, kotero mutha kulumikizana ndi anthu ochokera kumayiko ndi zikhalidwe zosiyanasiyana.

appearance.title: Mawonekedwe Osinthika
appearance.subtitle: Zithunzi zathu zowoneka bwino za chilankhulo chamanja zimapereka zosankha zingapo kuti zigwirizane ndi zosowa zanu.
appearance.description: Kaya mukufuna kupanga avatar yomwe ikuwoneka ngati inu kapena kupanga mawonekedwe apadera, zosankha zathu zosinthira zimakulolani kuti muzitha kudziwonetsera m'njira yomwe ikuwoneka ngati yowona komanso yowona kwa inu.

open-source.title: Open Source Project
open-source.subtitle: Sign Translate ndi pulojekiti yotseguka, yomwe imalola anthu ammudzi kuti athandizire komanso kuwongolera mawonekedwe ake.
open-source.description: Pogawana khodi yathu yochokera, tikufuna kulimbikitsa mgwirizano ndi kuwonekera.

offline.title: Offline magwiridwe antchito
offline.subtitle: Sainani Zomasulira ntchito kulikonse, ngakhale osalumikizidwa pa ndege.
offline.description: Kaya mukuyenda, kumadera akutali, kapena opanda intaneti, pulogalamu yathu imaonetsetsa kuti mumamasulira chinenero cholankhulidwa kapena cholembedwa m'chinenero cha manja, ndikusunga zida zofunika zolankhulirana mosavuta.

text-to-speech.unavailable: Kutulutsa mawu kulibe m'chinenero chomwe mwasankha

speech-to-text.not-allowed: Mukufuna chilolezo kuti mugwiritse ntchito cholankhulira
speech-to-text.service-not-allowed: Mukufuna chilolezo kuti mugwiritse ntchito kuzindikira mawu
